message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. For this unique opportunity, I propose a price of $120. This includes not only the product itself but also a limited-time access to exclusive tips and resources designed to maximize its benefits for you. Let me know if you're interested in exploring this further!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium for a quality product, but I'm on a bit of a budget. Can you meet me in the middle at $105?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your budgetary considerations. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $110. This price reflects the high quality and unique features of the product while still allowing us to cover our costs and maintain our business operations. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Please let me know if you are open to this proposal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $110. I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $95. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider this offer?
